page.title: 14THE POST OFFICE
page.content:
My Mum is the postmistress of a small village post office near Mickley. We have got to know many people. They come to pay their telephone bills,TV license, buy stamps and postal orders and collect their Family Allowance money and pensions. My Mum helps when they want to know about special forms. The mail is collected twice a day. We sell sweets, crisps and pop. {Ian Knaggs Age 9
I have come to live in Mickley from South Africa where my Daddy was a post office superintendent. His post office was very different from the one in Mickley. There were guards at the entrance and he had a special code number to get into his office. He hopes to be a postmaster in England. {Deborah Kay Age 9
